entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [8.0] Test failure in System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.MainWindowHandle_GetWithGui_ShouldRefresh_Windows #101700
  • JIT should use boxing helper to box structs with many GC pointers #101699
    Future
  • [Analyzer] Flagging issues in logger message templates w/ incomplete braces pairs #101698
    Future
  • segv in JIT when ingesting dotnet/runtime into dotnet/aspnetcore #101695
  • [API Proposal]: Allow lookups using alternative key on ``SortedSet<T>`` and ``SortedDictionary<T>`` #101694
  • [tvos][arm64] Segfault in System.Formats.Tests #101692
  • The archive entry was compressed using an unsupported compression method. #101689
  • Strange behavior while using compile-time logging source generation without message template #101687
    9.0.0
  • superpmi replay/diff osx/arm64 failing #101685
    9.0.0
  • How to Apply XML Configuration for Removing Specific Attribute Instances in .NET Linker ( NativeAOT ) #101680
  • [API Proposal]: Bulk copy properties from one object to another #101676
  • [API Proposal]: STJ `SystemTextJsonOutputFormatter` output type selector #101675
  • System.Text.Json: DefaultJsonTypeInfoResolver throws on `CreateJsonTypeInfo` for interfaces with duplicate properties #101673
  • Building runtime on Windows 11 ARM machine targetting x64 #101668
  • AssemblyBuilder still lacks SetEntryPoint #101667

Closed

  • Debugging With InteractiveAuto When Changes To Webassembly #96137
  • Segmentation fault when .NET starts JIT compilation of previous recorded methods triggered by `ProfileOptimization.StartProfile` #81799
    9.0.0
  • DirectoryNotFoundException on Directory.Create #97980
  • Clean repository build results in: AsnXml regenerated files, be sure to check them in #101651
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator generates non-compilable code with new property and internal setter #101267
    9.0.0
  • Prevent runtime loading of my assembly into another application in C# #101678
  • Outerloop test builds broken #101628

PullRequests

Created

  • Arm64/Sve: Add SignExtend* and ZeroExtend* math APIs #101702
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Remove perfinfo-%pid.map #101697
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Replay recorded allocPgoInstrumentationBySchema HRESULT #101696
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace NETCOREAPP compiler directive with NET #101693
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [TESTONLY] Add all changes for statics as one commit #101691
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Prefer most derived member in Configuration Binder source generator #101686
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.x
  • Disable OpenSSL internal SSL_SESSION cache for clients #101684
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Refactor mono_fixup_symbol_name #101681
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AddAcross #101674
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [wasm] Switch off `HybridGlobalization` lane on v8 on CI #101671
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #101098
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable TensorPrimitives vectorization of Log, Cbrt, Pow, and RootN #101690
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix AV in host from tracing on exit #101260
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.31
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #100984
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #101099
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reduce generic specialized code in console formatters #101474
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Bump actions/checkout from 2.0.0 to 4.1.4 #101585
    community-contribution, area-codeflow
  • Annotate `config.GetValue()` with `[NotNullIfNotNull]` #101336
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Bump dotnet/actions-create-pull-request from 3 to 4 #101586
    community-contribution, area-codeflow
  • Replace usage of out-of-support TFM compiler directives #101672
    area-Meta
  • Bump actions/upload-artifact from 1 to 4 #101587
    community-contribution, area-codeflow
  • Bump actions/github-script from 6 to 7 #101588
    community-contribution, area-codeflow
  • JIT: Move internal reserved registers to a side table #101647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement divide/multiply/subtract Math APIs #101578
    arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix handling of case-sensitive set loops in RegexPrefixAnalyzer.FindPrefixes #101608
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Ignore line endings when comparing AsnXml generated content #101657
    area-System.Security
  • Read EnableWriteXorExecute from runtimeConfig #101490
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Only warn on duplicate members within a single descriptors file #101574
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Prefer most derived member in Configuration Binder source generator #101316
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • fixed the split error for LoongArch64. #101656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Change S.R.M.TypeName to be consumed from System.Reflection.Metadata package #101666
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata

Updated

  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Merge JIT/Methodical tests into the merged runners #101317
    area-Infrastructure
  • Preserve static type info for return value of ctor #101212
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove unnecessary indirect use of managed wcslen from AppContext setup #101318
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Tensor wave 1 API's. #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [NOREVIEW][NOMERGE] HTTP/3 stress data corruption hunt #101624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • [Test Only] async safe point interrupts after NOP change #101151
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Add support for primary constructors in LoggerMessageGenerator #101660
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Backport #92296 to release/8.0-staging #101627
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • GC: Fix survival rates for LOH/POH #100716
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize Vector64.Create for constants #101662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add more complete linux build instructions #101631
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable derived COM interfaces to hide base methods with the new keyword #101577
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Clean up in LowerStoreIndirCoalescing #101665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Initial prototype for strength reduction #101431
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Commit Accounting related changes #100380
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix #91958: use mach_timebase_info to determine process time coefficient on macOS #100122
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • [mono] Force Mono to respect explicit struct size when LayoutKind.Sequential is used #101529
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "FileConfigurationProvider.Dispose should dispose FileProvider when it owns it" #101610
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • Code Versioning - move native code versioning state #101652
    area-VM-coreclr, Future
  • JIT: Allow moving handler regions in fgRelocateEHRegions #101613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactor some DateTime and TimeSpan formatting/parsing methods #101640
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [S390x] Fix stack offset size while passing structure as argument. #101103
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • With system brotli, do not use versioned symbols #101576
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Handle > 64 registers + predicate registers for Arm64 #98258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 124.0.6367.91, windows: 124.0.6367.91 #101653
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Try to reduce cost of Async #101605
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Tar: support GNU numeric format. #101172
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Process.Linux: handle when /proc and the process pid namespace don't match. #100076
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Fix regression from RuntimeType.AllocateValueType rewrite #101137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rework ProbabilisticMap character checks in SearchValues #101001
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Duplicate nupkg files are placed when install .NET Global Tool with .NET 8 SDK #40528
  • `dotnet new list` locks up terminals #40523
  • SDK spends an unreasonable amount of time in restoring out-of-support SDKs #40522
  • dotnet restore doesn't respect the <RuntimeIdentifier> for sdk-style project. #40517

Closed

  • [NETE2ESDK] On Ubuntu 24.04 ARM32 only, creating webapi project failed with error NU1301. #40505
  • The Container test failed due to no available .NET9 images #36160

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove duplicated Version file entries #40546
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Add preview VS note to developer guide #40542
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Permit installing unlisted Fixes #40440 #40534
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Reduced frequency of GitHub stale action; add action write permissions #40533
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Manually update Microsoft.DotNet.Test.ProjectTemplates.8.0 #40538
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add more workload set tests #40388
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Remove Newtonsoft.Json usage #40520
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable a bunch of container tests #40191
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Fix cloaking of `aspnetcoremodeule-setup` #40518
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix reporter encoding #40391
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Clean up PR artifacts publishing #40486
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CS8602 false positive after TryGetValue #73274
  • [BUG] "Move Type To .." feature not generating new .cs file #73273
    17.11 P3
  • Error when applying IDE0079 in problems tab #73272
    17.11 P3
  • Collection expression span optimization should reuse temps when possible #73269
  • RelationalOperatorType: Invalid OperatorType for Char #73267
  • Using IDisposable will dispose before Task Continuation is completed. #73264
  • Debug assertion failure in GuardedAddBoundTreeForStandaloneSyntax #73262
    17.11
  • IDE0200 (remove unnecessary lambda expression) can change semantics when capturing writable members #73259
    Backlog
  • C# Format Problem: Insert space before comma #73258
    Backlog
  • Unhelpful/annoying intellisense suggestion when calling method with params if the argument is an expression/func #73257
  • Type inference for lambdas in collection expressions #73256

Closed

  • AbstractFileHeaderDiagnosticAnalyzer uses `CustomSeverityConfigurable` but does not provide a way to set the custom severity #72876
    17.10
  • Remove unnecessary imports analyzer is significantly slowing builds (11% CPU time) #72162
  • Tracking issue for any pull diagnostics coordinated insert work. #72428
    17.10 P2
  • CS1503 cannot convert from 'object' to #73098

PullRequests

Created

  • Update configs for 17.11 branch #73271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Nullable annotate InMethodyBinder #73270
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • On The Fly Documentation #73268
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move test reference assemblies forward #73266
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.11
  • Require AddExplicitInterfaceImplementation for adding a type that implements member explicitly #73265
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

Merged

  • Avoid setting `hasAnyCodeStyleOption` for analyzers with no `CodeStyleOption2<T>` #73263
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.11 P1
  • Restore parallel processing options for Find-References. #73255
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.11 P1
  • Allow use of more Hot Reload brokered services by LSP (for VS Code) #73240
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, 17.11 P1

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73275
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Partial properties: merging declarations and emit of simple cases #72999
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Fix IOperation of byref member initializer #73243
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #73208
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Resolve extension members in all non-invocation contexts #73239
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73232
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Enable Arcade V3 publishing in PR Validation #73221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use a simple temp instead of InlineArray1 #73086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enable hosts to provide custom assembly resolution #73185
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test if code is needed #73163
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Fix need for redundant enter when rename suggestions are not available #73247
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use semantics to check for readonly struct #72893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Handle labels in outer scope in control flow pass #73234
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.11
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Update Semantic Search to work when ServiceHub is disabled #73196
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error while adding user to role if AutoSaveChanges is false #55433
  • Route Recognition of method with input type #55431
  • VS 2022 Preview should recognize changes to *.js files in Blazor component library #55429
  • Minify and bundle isolated css files and js scripts in Blazor Server Self Contained when publisihing : <projectname>.css file. #55428
  • Windows Authentication Type #55427
  • Blazor Server sites break when ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT is set to anything other than Development, Staging, or Production #55426
  • Perf regression: https, multiple_queries #55424
  • net8 Razor Pages Web App with Blazor Component. Component not working from csthml page #55415
  • Output caching middleware : Is Etag only compared to server cached data? #55414
  • add Flexible Authorisation to default templates #55413

Closed

  • Deprecation notice for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http package, provider of IFormFile #55430
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #55365
  • Add support for OpenAPI document filters #54650
    9.0-preview4
  • Support multiple OpenAPI documents per application #54676
    9.0-preview4
  • The current environment is Blazor Wasm, and the API tool used is Refit, and the current requirement is to bring the AD information in the Windows domain when logging in to request the API in exchange for a token #55378
  • Loading For Component Time load #55409
  • Issue with Icon and DateTime Picker functionality after Implementing Bootstrap Theme #55336
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.4.24209.6] When launch the WorldExplorer homepage, it shows an error "An item with the same key has already been added. Key: Content-Security-Policy" #55054
    9.0-preview5
  • Unprefixed Hosting Environment Variable is ignored #55379
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextEmptyFilter #55411

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine CheckStdoutWithLargeWrites_TestSink #55432
    area-networking
  • Relocate webtransport streams initialisation from HTTP3 connection accept loop to streams type #55425
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add utf-8 BOM to sln file to force utf-8 encoding #55423
    area-mvc
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.5.24229.2 #55416
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Quarantine and attempt to fix CacheTagHelper_VaryByCultureComposesWithOtherVaryByOptions test #55369
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview5
  • Fix form handling and add NuGet pkg docs #55321
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview5
  • Fix typos in APIBaselines.md #55393
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • [H/3] Fix code passed into QuicConnection.CloseAsync and QuicStream.Abort #55282
    area-networking
  • Use built-in OpenAPI support in templates #55343
    area-mvc
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Set the baggage even when the trace id is not successfully extracted #55341
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Change how ANCM recycles app #55288
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 8.0.x
  • Ensure OutputCaching generates a documentation file #55170
    area-middleware
  • UnixCertificateManager: implement IsTrusted. #55335
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-gcdump seem not reflect the memory usage of my dump #4647
  • dotnet-counters not showing metric names #4646
  • Error: Fail to create host ldelegate 80070002 #4648

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FilePicker on iOS: double quotes (0x22) in picked json file replaced by 0xAB («) the 1st time it is opened+read #22127
  • Problem updating CollectionView ItemSource, when the modification is triggered by one of the items in the list #22122
  • More problems with the Picker #22121
  • CollectionView.Header is header is not scrollable in Android platform. #22120
  • FlyoutPage's menu icon not showing, when used in a NavigationPage on Android #22116
  • The keyboard overlaps with the Entry inside the ContentView when translating its x position to the right side. #22115
  • Disappearing MAUI templates and dotnet new install Microsoft.Maui.Templates does not work #22114
  • ScrollView Orientation is not changed at Runtime in IOS and MAC #22111
  • XAML Compile Causes Failure at Run Time #22110

Closed

  • TabbedPage title displays incorrectly. It displays current selected child page title #8577
    .NET 8 SR6
  • [Testing] Re-Enable/move DoneClosesKeyboard to Appium #20533
    Backlog
  • Actually, I had a feeling this might have already been asked and it has: #2292 #22123
  • iOS: App Crashes when ObservableCollection is modified inside a Task #21452
    .NET 8 SR6
  • [WinUI3] Program has exited with code 2147942405 (0x80070005) #21901

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] fix one layer of "overdraw" by default #22126
  • [UI Test] Update Appium to 5.0.0-rc.8 #22117
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

Merged

  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨, stale
  • [UI Testing] Implement PressEnter method #22112
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Update versions preview4 #22118
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [iOS] Shell page title fix #20575
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-button
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area/templates 📄, community ✨
  • [Android] Crash removing item from CarouselView - fix #22107
    platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Remove excess check in iOS input transparency checks #21883
  • [Windows] Fix pointer released event not being handled on ImageButton #21766
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Windows] Clamp images inside buttons to button width/height #21733
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Flyout Page support for IconImageSource #22099
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, control-flyout
  • [UI Test] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #21897
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #21304
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Binding source generator #21725
    area/Xaml </>
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in modal pages #22089
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [Controls] Enforce CA1507 - use nameof() where possible #22102
    community ✨
  • Enforce CA1854 performance analyzer #22100
    community ✨
  • [XC] Compile "standalone" bindings #22023
    area/Xaml </>
  • [WinUI] Perf when creating non-trivial grids (and other visual controls) (take 2) #22108
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Minor optimization for `MergedStyle.SetStyle` #21540
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leaks in `*Cell` #22067
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo and Mono dependencies #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Testing] Added UITest to validate the Switch OnColor property #20542
    area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-switch, testing-flakiness
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/gestures
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • Fix PointerGestureHandler not registering touches on android #22109
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • [X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match #22056
    area/Xaml </>
  • Make ImageSource more async-friendly #22098
    area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • too many migrations files give compilation error and even BSOD #33641
  • Minor work items left for CSharpToLinqTranslator #33639
    Backlog
  • How do I debug why a performance issue occurs when it doesn't if I use the EF given query? #33638
  • Generalize the restriction on executing Include methods on query provider #33636
  • Translate ToString on enums with number store types as a CASE/WHEN expression #33635
  • Add more granularity for OpenTelemetry metrics #33634
  • SQlite Error 11 'database disk image is malformed' #33630

Closed

  • Use interceptors to redirect the query to precompiled code #31331
    9.0.0
  • Infer inline collection element type mappings from each other (and onto the projection) #33438
    9.0.0-preview4
  • Migrations: Inconsistency between migration and Script-DbContext when adding a required string property. #33604
  • ExecuteUpdate for Dynamic Entity #33626
  • Consider adding a CommandBehavior parameter to RelationCommand methods. #33574
  • Consider adding ExecuteSqlReader/ExecuteSqlRawReader and ExecuteSqlScalar/ExecuteSqlRawScalar APIs #33569
  • Help with sqlite provider in ServiceColleciton.AddDbContext() - Maui 7/efcore 7.0.18 #33628

PullRequests

Created

  • Reset CommandBatchPreparer state immediatly after execution #33642
  • Various code cleanup/styling for Cosmos query pipeline #33637
  • OTEL implementation, so far matching EventCounters infrastructure. #33633

Merged

  • Implement precompiled queries #33297

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Don't generate a discriminator in the snapshot if there's no discriminator property. #33622
  • Use [CallerArgumentExpression] for parameterName argument in Check methods #33524

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-29
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix cloaking of `aspnetcoremodeule-setup` #19604

Updated

  • Use asset manifests exclusively to produce/consume previously source built artifacts #19585
    Area-SourceBuild
